Html:
Is there a way to save all images included in an excel file in a custom directory using PHPExcel_Reader?

I need to convert an excel with images into html and save it into db.
So I'd need to save images in the server to see html correctly.

Cene
Using the PHPExcel 2007 reader it is definately possible. Try the getDrawingCollection property on a worksheet.

maartenba wrote:
Using the PHPExcel 2007 reader it is definately possible. Try the getDrawingCollection property on a worksheet.

Sorry, but I don't find any method called "getDrawingCollection" in the class.

Check the worksheet object for that method.
